item.title: AMD Could Double From Here—Thanks to Its Blockbuster OpenAI Deal
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices is on track to double in share price, reaching the $400 level in mid-2026 as expectations for MI450 sales intensify.

item.title: The Juice Is Loose: Why Plug Power's Rally Is Just the Beginning
item.description: Plug Power's stock surge is backed by landmark gigawatt-scale electrolyzer deals and a new growth story tied to the power demands of the AI industry.

item.title: 3 Dividend Aristocrats to Buy Before Year’s End
item.description: Dividend Aristocrats offer attractive entries at long-term lows: the dividends are reliable, and the share prices are likely to recover.

item.title: Why Semtech Stock Is Rallying After Its NVIDIA Setback
item.description: After its NVIDIA-induced cratering, Semtech is up more than 80%. Analysts see more upside to come in this surging chip stock.
